art.author: vicky_thomsen
art.post: Young Colton Burpo and Akiane Kramarik have been blessed by G-d with their visions thus making it possible for us to see special insights into the realm beyond the curtain of death. The Prince of Peace is so real with the message that Jesus really loves the children! Thanks be to G-d for his love. Thanks to Colton and Akiane for sharing with the world their visions.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
